titles: To a gentleman, a member of the Honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: Signed and dated at end of letter: Newgate July 8. 1646. Sir, Your servant Roger L'estrange.
Includes [after letter]: To the honourable the Commons assembled in Parliament. The petition of Roger L'estrange, prisoner in Newgate.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Prisoners --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
